publicationStmt.publisher: To the Reader: The English Preface in Print, c. 1475-1640 / Early English Books Online Text Creation Partnership

monogr.title: The honor of the married clergie, maintayned against the malicious challenges of C.E. masse-priest: or, the apologie written some yeeres since for the marriage of persons ecclesiasticall : made good against the cauils of C.E· pseudo-Catholike priest. In three books. By Ios. Hall, D. of Diuin. Deane of Worcest
monogr.author: Hall, Joseph

argument.p: By reason of my necessary absence from the Presse, many Errata haue passed, whereof these are more obuious to my Reader, which I desire him to correct.

div.head: Errata.
div.p:
PAge 29. Marg. Beatit. tit for filij. p. 31. l. 13. Ad, redundat. p. 35. l. 21. And, redundat. p. 49. l. 20. for Scholer read Schole. p. 52. Marg. 〈 in non-Latin alphabet 〉 . r. 〈 in non-Latin alphabet 〉 . p. 53. l. 9. affectly r. affectedly. p. 54. l. vlt. pacem r. parem. p. 70. l. 18. Theu r. the. p. 76. l. • . was r. vses. p. 81. l. penult. there r. thee. p. 85. Marg. prius r. p • ius. p. 97. l. 16. vigilantius, r. vigilantius: p. 101. l. 2. dare r. cleare▪ p. 103. l. 17. now r.
